alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 19 at 2:21PM PDT until March 19 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High winds are still possible on Tuesday and are now incorporated into a Winter Storm Watch.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
